ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of April, 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Whether an inoperable handgun is a firearm pursuant to 42 Pa.C.S. § 9712(e) for sentence enhancement purposes.
